div.div: Rhodes College vs. Univ. of Chicago

tr.td: Chicago wins toss, defers. Rhodes to receive.
Kurzydlowski,M. kickoff 65 yards to the RHO0, touchback.
Roc Sherrell rush for 9 yards to the RHO34 (Anderson,C.).
Monroe McKay rush for 2 yards to the RHO36, 1ST DOWN RHO (Atiyeh,Zach).
P.J. Settles rush for 8 yards to the RHO44 (Atiyeh,Zach).
Roc Sherrell rush for 4 yards to the RHO48, 1ST DOWN RHO (Byrne,Grant).
Roc Sherrell rush for loss of 4 yards to the RHO44, fumble by Roc Sherrell recovered by RHO Roc Sherrell at RHO39 (Rotnicki,Bill).
P.J. Settles pass complete to Josh Lucas for 5 yards to the RHO44 (Atiyeh,Zach), QB hurry by Casey,Peter, QB hurry by McGinley,Mike.
P.J. Settles pass incomplete to Brandon Box.
Turner Kim punt 26 yards to the UC30, out-of-bounds.
UNIV. OF CHICAGO drive start at 11:30.
Moser,Burke pass complete to Carroll,C. for 4 yards to the UC34 (Bron McPherson;Cody Stockton).
